RequirementsÂ¶

  • Ansible >= 2.8.

  • Jinja2.

  • Pip.

  • Python.

  • PyYAML.

  • Requests.

If you want to run the tests, you will also need:

  • Docker.

  • Molecule.

  • Setuptools.
